attributes.action: Remove free transport and accommodation for M.P's and Government Ministers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government are all to keen to slam extra expense onto the motorist. Would they be so keen if they had to pay, from their own over inflated salaries, all travel and accommodation expenses instead of claiming their right to free transport and other benefits.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
